channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parking sign removed, causing anti social behaviour, 17th October
item.description:
It’s been missing for multiple months now. People are using it as an opportunity to park here for free, it has caused a lot of gatherings and loud car revving and music etc
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harvey Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 17th October-Continuos Littering at the bus stop, 17th October
item.description:
Very foul smelling blue bag which i had to dump in my bin so that it doesn't scattering later in the night time. There are still glass pieces scattered around bus stop. Needs attention and action to the ones doing it intentionally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree split, 17th October
item.description:
A branch has split off from a tree and requires attention due to dangerous positioning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porchester Square, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 151 York way, 17th October
item.description:
New road layout, signage and cycle lanes are causing multiple cars to accidentally turn from hungerford road into a cycle lane and pedestrian path. This happens multiple times a week and today a car punctured its tires, alsmost crashed into 2 people. This has continually happened since new road layout was established including lamp posts being knocked down, islands being smashed into and bollards being flattened. I have a lot of footage of this happening from my ring doorbell
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): York Way, Holloway, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped furniture and rubbish, 17th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Longcroft, Coldharbour, London

item.description:

item.title: Hazelbourne road is disgusting, 17th October
item.description:
Again this road looks disgusting. It’s just not being cleaned / litter picked regularly enough. Lots of litter including broken glass. It’s so depressing to have to report this again and again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Balham Hill, Balham, London
